1: בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>In that day</n> הַה֗וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יִֽהְיֶה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מָק֣וֹר <sup>4726 </sup> <n>there shall be a fountain</n> נִפְתָּ֔ח <sup>6605 </sup> <n>opened</n> לְבֵ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>to the house</n> דָּוִ֖יד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> וּלְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and to the inhabitants</n> יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>of Jerusalem</n> לְחַטַּ֖את <sup>2403 </sup> <n>for sin</n> וּלְנִדָּֽה׃ <sup>5079 </sup> <n>and for uncleanness</n>
2: וְהָיָה֩ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will come</n> בַיּ֨וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass in that day</n> הַה֜וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> נְאֻ֣ם ׀ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> צְבָא֗וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> אַכְרִ֞ית <sup>3772 </sup> <n>[that] I will cut off</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁמ֤וֹת <sup>8034 </sup> <n>the names</n> הָֽעֲצַבִּים֙ <sup>6091 </sup> <n>of the idols</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will no</n> יִזָּכְר֖וּ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>and they shall no more be remembered</n> ע֑וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n> וְגַ֧ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>will also</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַנְּבִיאִ֛ים <sup>5030 </sup> <n>and also I will cause the prophets</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> ר֥וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>spirit</n> הַטֻּמְאָ֖ה <sup>2932 </sup> <n>and the unclean</n> אַעֲבִ֥יר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>to pass</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n>
3: וְהָיָ֗ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>and if</n> יִנָּבֵ֣א <sup>5012 </sup> <n>shall yet prophesy</n> אִישׁ֮ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass [that] when any</n> עוֹד֒ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>still</n> וְאָמְר֣וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>him shall say</n> אֵ֠לָיו <sup>413 </sup> <n>then</n> אָבִ֨יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>then his father</n> וְאִמּ֤וֹ <sup>517 </sup> <n>and his mother</n> יֹֽלְדָיו֙ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>that begat</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תִֽחְיֶ֔ה <sup>2421 </sup> <n>unto him Thou shalt not live</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>and if</n> שֶׁ֥קֶר <sup>8267 </sup> <n>lies</n> דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>for thou speakest</n> בְּשֵׁ֣ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>in the name</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וּדְקָרֻ֜הוּ <sup>1856 </sup> <n>him shall thrust</n> אָבִ֧יהוּ <sup>1 </sup> <n>and his father</n> וְאִמּ֛וֹ <sup>517 </sup> <n>and his mother</n> יֹלְדָ֖יו <sup>3205 </sup> <n>that begat</n> בְּהִנָּבְאֽוֹ׃ <sup>5012 </sup> <n>him through when he prophesieth</n>
4: וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will come</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass in that day</n> הַה֗וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יֵבֹ֧שׁוּ <sup>954 </sup> <n>shall be ashamed</n> הַנְּבִיאִ֛ים <sup>5030 </sup> <n>[that] the prophets</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every one</n> מֵחֶזְיֹנ֖וֹ <sup>2384 </sup> <n>of his vision</n> בְּהִנָּֽבְאֹת֑וֹ <sup>5012 </sup> <n>when he hath prophesied</n> וְלֹ֧א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and they will not</n> יִלְבְּשׁ֛וּ <sup>3847 </sup> <n>neither shall they wear</n> אַדֶּ֥רֶת <sup>155 </sup> <n>garment</n> שֵׂעָ֖ר <sup>8181 </sup> <n>a rough</n> לְמַ֥עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>order</n> כַּחֵֽשׁ׃ <sup>3584 </sup> <n>to deceive</n>
5: וְאָמַ֕ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>But he shall say</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>I am not</n> נָבִ֖יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>I [am] no prophet</n> אָנֹ֑כִי <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> אִישׁ־ <sup>376 </sup> <n>he</n> עֹבֵ֤ד <sup>5647 </sup> <n>serve</n> אֲדָמָה֙ <sup>127 </sup> <n>of the ground</n> אָנֹ֔כִי <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אָדָ֖ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>for man</n> הִקְנַ֥נִי <sup>7069 </sup> <n>taught me to keep cattle</n> מִנְּעוּרָֽי׃ <sup>5271 </sup> <n>from my youth</n>
6: וְאָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And [one] shall say</n> אֵלָ֔יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> מָ֧ה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> הַמַּכּ֛וֹת <sup>4347 </sup> <n>unto him What [are] these wounds</n> הָאֵ֖לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>are these</n> בֵּ֣ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> יָדֶ֑יךָ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>and one</n> וְאָמַ֕ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>will say</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> הֻכֵּ֖יתִי <sup>5221 </sup> <n>[Those] with which I was wounded</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>[in] the house</n> מְאַהֲבָֽי׃ <sup>157 </sup> <n>of my friends</n> ס
7: חֶ֗רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>O sword</n> עוּרִ֤י <sup>5782 </sup> <n>Awake</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> רֹעִי֙ <sup>7473 </sup> <n>shipherd</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and against</n> גֶּ֣בֶר <sup>1397 </sup> <n>and against the man</n> עֲמִיתִ֔י <sup>5997 </sup> <n>[that is] my fellow</n> נְאֻ֖ם <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> צְבָא֑וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> הַ֤ךְ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>smite</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָֽרֹעֶה֙ <sup>7462 </sup> <n>against my shepherd</n> וּתְפוּצֶ֣יןָ <sup>6327 </sup> <n>shall be scattered</n> הַצֹּ֔אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>and the sheep</n> וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֥י <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and I will turn</n> יָדִ֖י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>mine hand</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> הַצֹּעֲרִֽים׃ <sup>6819 </sup> <n>upon the little ones</n>
8: וְהָיָ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will come</n> בְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass [that] in all the land</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> פִּֽי־ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>parts</n> שְׁנַ֣יִם <sup>8147 </sup> <n>two</n> בָּ֔הּ יִכָּרְת֖וּ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>therein shall be cut off</n> יִגְוָ֑עוּ <sup>1478 </sup> <n>[and] die</n> וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁ֖ית <sup>7992 </sup> <n>but the third</n> יִוָּ֥תֶר <sup>3498 </sup> <n>shall be left</n> בָּֽהּ׃
9: וְהֵבֵאתִ֤י <sup>935 </sup> <n>And I will bring</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַשְּׁלִשִׁית֙ <sup>7992 </sup> <n>the third part</n> בָּאֵ֔שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>through the fire</n> וּצְרַפְתִּים֙ <sup>6884 </sup> <n>and will refine</n> כִּצְרֹ֣ף <sup>6884 </sup> <n>is refined</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַכֶּ֔סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>them as silver</n> וּבְחַנְתִּ֖ים <sup>974 </sup> <n>and will try</n> כִּבְחֹ֣ן <sup>974 </sup> <n>is tried</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַזָּהָ֑ב <sup>2091 </sup> <n>them as gold</n> ה֣וּא ׀ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>They</n> יִקְרָ֣א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>they shall call</n> בִשְׁמִ֗י <sup>8034 </sup> <n>on my name</n> וַֽאֲנִי֙ <sup>589 </sup> <n>and I</n> אֶעֱנֶ֣ה <sup>6030 </sup> <n>and I will hear</n> אֹת֔וֹ <sup>853 </sup> אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>them I will say</n> עַמִּ֣י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>It [is] my people</n> ה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וְה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>I</n> יֹאמַ֖ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and they shall say</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>[is] my God</n> ס
